alink="#800000">

<div class=WordSection1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%"
 style='width:100.0%;border-collapse:collapse;mso-yfti-tbllook:1184;mso-padding-alt:
 0in 0in 0in 0in'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes;
  height:.75pt'>
  <td width="21%" style='width:21.0%;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;height:.75pt'>
  <p align=center style='text-align:center;mso-line-height-alt:.75pt'> </p>
  <p align=center style='text-align:center;mso-line-height-alt:.75pt'><span
  style='mso-no-proof:yes'><img width=267 height=230 id="_x0000_i1029"
  src=eli005.jpg></span><o:p></o:p></p>
  </td>
  <td width="79%" valign=top style='width:79.0%;background:white;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;
  height:.75pt;word-spacing:0in'>
  <p> </p>
  <p style='text-indent:26.9pt'><b><span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
  "Verdana Ref","serif"'><o:p> </o:p></span></b></p>
  <p style='text-indent:26.9pt'><span class=SpellE><b><span style='font-size:
  11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Verdana","sans-serif"'>Elaheh</span></b></span><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Verdana","sans-serif"'>
  (Eli) <span class=SpellE>Bozorgzadeh</span></span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Verdana Ref","serif"'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p style='margin-left:-.1pt;text-indent:26.9pt'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
  font-family:"Verdana","sans-serif"'>Associate Professor</span></p>
  <p style='text-indent:26.9pt'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Verdana","sans-serif"'>Computer
  Science Department</span></p>
  <p style='text-indent:26.9pt'><st1:PlaceType w:st="on"><span
   style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Verdana","sans-serif"'>University</span></st1:PlaceType><span
  style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Verdana","sans-serif"'> of <st1:PlaceName
  w:st="on">California</st1:PlaceName>, <st1:place w:st="on"><st1:City w:st="on">Irvine</st1:City></st1:place>
  </span></p>
  <p style='text-indent:26.9pt'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Verdana","sans-serif"'>phone:
  949-824-8860</span></p>
  <p style='text-indent:26.9pt'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Verdana","sans-serif"'> </span><span
  style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Verdana","sans-serif";mso-no-proof:yes'><img
  width=124 height=18 id="_x0000_i1028" src=email.jpg></span></p>
  <p style='text-indent:26.9pt'><i><span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
  "Verdana","sans-serif"'>Affiliated with:</span></i></p>
  <p style='text-indent:26.9pt'><b><span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
  "Verdana","sans-serif"'>Center for Embedded Computer Systems (<a
  href="http://www.cecs.uci.edu">CECS</a>)</span></b></p>
  <p style='text-indent:26.9pt'><b><span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
  "Verdana","sans-serif"'>California Institute for Telecommunication and
  Information Technology (<a href="http://www.calit2.net/">Calit2</a>)</span></b></p>
  <p style='mso-line-height-alt:.75pt'> </p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p> <b><span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Verdana","sans-serif"'>Research
Interests</span></b></p>

<ul type=disc>
 <li class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
     mso-list:l5 level1 lfo3;tab-stops:list .5in'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
     font-family:"Verdana","sans-serif"'>System Synthesis for Self-adaptive
     Reconfigurable Embedded Systems</span></li>
 <li class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
     mso-list:l5 level1 lfo3;tab-stops:list .5in'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
     font-family:"Verdana","sans-serif"'>Energy Sustainability in Embedded
     systems through micro energy harvesting</span></li>
 <li class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
     mso-list:l5 level1 lfo3;tab-stops:list .5in'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
     font-family:"Verdana","sans-serif"'>Physically-aware Architectural
     Synthesis and layout planning for Embedded Systems</span></li>
 <li class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
     mso-list:l5 level1 lfo3;tab-stops:list .5in'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
     font-family:"Verdana","sans-serif"'>Early physical planning for rapid
     timing closure (Timing budget management)</span></li>
</ul>

<p><b><span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Verdana","sans-serif"'>Awards</span></b></p>

<ul type=disc>
 <li class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
     mso-list:l1 level1 lfo6;tab-stops:list .5in'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
     font-family:"Verdana","sans-serif"'>NSF CAREER Award, 2008</span></li>
 <li class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
     mso-list:l1 level1 lfo6;tab-stops:list .5in'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
     font-family:"Verdana","sans-serif"'>Best paper award, IEEE International
     Conference in Field Programmable Logic and Applications (FPL), 2006.</span></li>
</ul>

<p><b><span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Verdana","sans-serif"'>Recent
Activities</span></b></p>

<ul type=disc>
 <li class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
     mso-list:l0 level1 lfo9;tab-stops:list .5in'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
     font-family:"Verdana","sans-serif"'>ACM SIGDA DAC Summer School 2013
     (chair).</span></li>
 <li class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
     mso-list:l0 level1 lfo9;tab-stops:list .5in'><span class=SpellE><span
     style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Verdana","sans-serif"'>PerCom</span></span><span
     style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Verdana","sans-serif"'> 2013, Demo
     Co-chair, San Diego, March, 2013.</span></li>
 <li class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
     mso-list:l0 level1 lfo9;tab-stops:list .5in'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
     font-family:"Verdana","sans-serif"'>TPC member of IEEE Field Programmable
     Logic and Applications (FPL), 2013.</span></li>
 <li class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
     mso-list:l0 level1 lfo9;tab-stops:list .5in'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
     font-family:"Verdana","sans-serif"'>TPC member of ACM/IEEE International

 <li class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;

     font-family:"Verdana","sans-serif"'>TPC member, ACM/IEEE CODES/ISSS

</ul>
